name: Arcane Flames
effect: Continuous flames flow from the user’s outstretched hands, dealing 1d6 fire damage to all targets caught in the blaze. The caster’s willpower modifier is added to the damage of the spell.

name: Frostbite Blast
effect: A blast of cold wind flows from the user's outstretched hand, dealing 1d4 cold damage to all targets. The caster's willpower modifier is added to the damage.
